message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you $4000, and I'll take $6000. What do you say?
I'll take a slightly larger share, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to decide!
I'm not comfortable with the 80-20 split. I'd like to propose a 55-45 split. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'm willing to give you a 45% share, but I need to take the majority. Can you accept this compromise?
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I'm not giving up yet. Your turn to decide!
I'll accept this offer. I'm not sure if I can do better, and I don't want to risk going to another round with the money devaluing further.
